q1
=====

Purpose
------------

To use Lumache, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install lumache


q2
=====

Input
------------

   To use Lumache, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install lumache


Output
------------
To use Lumache, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install lumache



Function
------------

To use Lumache, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install lumache
